duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with the coordination, case management, and treatment of fertility patients
Teach about procedures and how to administer injections
Schedule treatment after initial and follow up visits
Coordinate patient treatment plans in conjunction with established clinical protocols
Establish a compassionate environment by providing emotional and psychological support to patients and patients' families
Required to work occasional weekends and holidays

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 1 year of clinical RN experience
